casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Rayford Lewis BURKE 181A93-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 19, 2019 Franklin E. Wells, Jr., Gretchen Engel, Malcolm Ray Hunter, Jr., Attorneys at Law, for Burke, Rayford Lewis Danielle Marquis Elder, Jonathan Babb, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, Mikko Red Arrow, Assistant District Attorney, Jonathan P. Babb, Special Counsel to Attorney General, Sarah Kirkman, District Attorney, for State of N.C. Christopher A. Brook, Legal Director, Burton Craige, James Coleman, Irving Joyner, Cassandra Stubbs, Attorney at Laws, for ACLU Capital Punishment Project, et al. Carlos E. Mahoney, Attorney at Law, for NAACP Legal Defense and Educational Fund, Inc. Brian W. Stull, Henderson Hill, Attorneys at Law, for Promise of Justice Initiative, et al. Jin Hee Lee, Merrel Murray, Attorneys at Law, Pro Hac Vice, for NAACP Legal Defense and Educational Fund, Inc.

*885The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 18th of March 2019 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 19th of March 2019."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 19th day of April 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
